text:
Michael Flynn Jr. Tweets That His Dadâ€™s Confirmed Immunity Request is â€œ#fakenewsâ€ by David Bixenspan | 11:06 am, March 31st, 2017 
Michael Flynn Jr. , noted Pizzagate truther and son of former National Security Advisor turned immunity requester Lt. Gen. Michael Flynn (Ret.), tweeted the following on Friday morning: Is anyone surprised the Mike Flynn #fakenews came out A DAY AFTER the @EvelynNFarkas bombshellâ€¦.??? 
â€” Michael Flynn JrğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ (@mflynnJR) March 31, 2017 
Thatâ€™s a bit curious since his fatherâ€™s lawyer, Robert Kelner, made it fairly clear on Thursday that the elder Flynn is seeking considerations for any testimony he may give. Just look at the key lines from the attorney letter: â€œGeneral Flynn certainly has a story to tell, and he very much wants to tell it, should the circumstances permit.â€ â€œHe is now the target of unsubstantiated public demands by Members of Congress and other political critics that he be criminally investigated. No reasonable person, who has the benefit of advice from counsel, would submit to questioning in such a highly politicized, witch hunt environment without assurances against unfair prosecution.â€ 
To make matters even more strange, Flynn the retweeted the attorneyâ€™s letter: 
He also retweeted the letter Thursday night. S0, what exactly heâ€™s saying is fake news is far from clear.
